## useSubscribe() function

Subscribe to a signal value in React. Re-renders the component when the signal changes.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function useSubscribe<T>(signal: Reactive<T>): T;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

signal


</td><td>

[Reactive](../signals/reactive/)<!-- -->&lt;T&gt;


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

T

## Example


```tsx
function Counter({ count }: { count: Readable<number> }) {
  const value = useSubscribe(count);
  return <span>{value}</span>;
}
```
